title: Can I put league back on my taskbar after repairing?
body:
The title of this thread is the only thing about it. I was just curious. 


Any answer I will take, especially from a Rioter. 


Thanks, 

Titanium12574
{{champion:14}} {{champion:72}}

replies.body: Well I know how to, I just don't know if it will make it so my games start crashing again

This is an issue we're currently tracking and is still on-going.  The [support page](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us) will keep a tracker posted on the top of the page until it's been resolved.  Thanks for your patience!
